trans-unit.source: A class that represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template.
A URI template allows you to define a set of structurally similar URIs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 URI 模板，可以定义一组结构相似的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Templates are composed of two parts, a path and a query.
trans-unit.target: 模板由两部分组成，即路径和查询。

trans-unit.source: A path consists of a series of segments delimited by a slash (/).
trans-unit.target: 路径由一系列由斜杠 (/) 分隔的段组成。

trans-unit.source: Each segment can have a literal value, a variable value (written within curly braces [{ }], constrained to match the contents of exactly one segment), or a wildcard (written as an asterisk [*], which matches "the rest of the path"), which must appear at the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 每个段都可以具有文本值、变量值（书写在大括号 [{ }] 内，且被限制为仅与一个段的内容匹配）或必须出现在路径末端的通配符（书写为星号 [*]，与“路径的其余部分”匹配）。

trans-unit.source: The query expression can be omitted entirely.
trans-unit.target: 查询表达式可以完全省略。

trans-unit.source: If present, it specifies an unordered series of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现表达式，则它指定一组无序的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: Elements of the query expression can be either literal pairs (?x=2) or variable pairs (?x={val}).
trans-unit.target: 查询表达式的元素可以是文本对 (?x=2)，也可以是变量对 (?x={val})。

trans-unit.source: Unpaired values are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允许使用不成对的值。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show valid template strings:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示有效的模板字符串：

trans-unit.source: "weather/WA/Seattle"
trans-unit.target: "weather/WA/Seattle"

trans-unit.source: "weather/{state}/{city}"
trans-unit.target: "weather/{state}/{city}"

trans-unit.source: "weather/*"
trans-unit.target: "weather/*"

trans-unit.source: "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast=today
trans-unit.target: "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast=today

trans-unit.source: "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast={day}
trans-unit.target: "weather/{state}/{city}?forecast={day}

trans-unit.source: The preceding URI templates might be used for organizing weather reports.
trans-unit.target: 前面的 URI 模板可用于组织天气预报。

trans-unit.source: Segments enclosed in curly braces are variables, everything else is a literal.
trans-unit.target: 括在大括号中的段都是变量，其他都是文本。

trans-unit.source: You can convert a <xref:System.UriTemplate> instance into a <xref:System.Uri> by replacing variables with actual values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用实际的值替换变量，将 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 实例转换成 <xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: For example, taking the template "weather/{state}/{city}" and putting in values for the variables "{state}" and "{city}" gives you "weather/WA/Seattle".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用模板“weather/{state}/{city}”，在变量“{state}”和“{city}”中输入值，便会得到“weather/WA/Seattle”。

trans-unit.source: Given a candidate URI, you can test whether it matches a given URI template by calling <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29> 来测试给定的候选 URI 是否与给定的 URI 模板匹配。

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.UriTemplate> instances to create a <xref:System.Uri> from a set of variable values by calling <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> or <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByPosition%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 也可以调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 或 <xref:System.Uri> 来使用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> 实例根据一组变量值创建 <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByPosition%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.UriTemplate> instance, and bind and match it to a candidate URI.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何创建 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 实例，并将其绑定和匹配到候选 URI。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> class
The template.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> class with the specified template string.
The following example shows how to call the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The template string.
A value that specifies whether trailing slash "/" characters should be ignored.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> class.
When the `ignoreTrailingSlash` is set to `true`, trailing slashes on the end of template are ignored when matching a candidate URI.
trans-unit.target: 当 `ignoreTrailingSlash` 设置为 `true` 时，如果将候选 URI 与模板匹配，将忽略模板末尾处的尾部正斜杠。

trans-unit.source: For example, a template such as "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/" would match the following candidate URIs:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如模板"http://www.microsoft.com/customer/"将与以下候选 Uri 匹配：

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/"
trans-unit.target: “http://www.microsoft.com/customer/”

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/customer"
trans-unit.target: “http://www.microsoft.com/customer”

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/customer/?wsdl"
trans-unit.target: “http://www.microsoft.com/customer/?wsdl”

trans-unit.source: "http://www.microsoft.com/customer?wsdl"
trans-unit.target: “http://www.microsoft.com/customer?wsdl”

trans-unit.source: The template string.
A dictionary that contains a list of default values for the template parameters.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> class.
The template string.
<see langword="true" /> if the trailing slash "/" characters are ignored; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
A dictionary that contains a list of default values for the template parameters.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> class.
Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
The base address.
A dictionary that contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs.
Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
A URI.
The [IDictionary\<string,string>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602) parameter contains a collection of parameter name and value pairs.
trans-unit.target: [IDictionary\<字符串、 字符串 >](xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602)参数包含参数名称和值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters are matched up against the variables within the template by a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 将参数与模板中的变量匹配时使用区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: The name/value collection passed to this method must contain a key for every template variable.
trans-unit.target: 传递给此方法的名称/值集合必须包含每个模板变量的键值。

trans-unit.source: Extra name/value pairs that do not match template variables are appended to the query string of the final URI.
trans-unit.target: 与模板变量不匹配的额外名称/值对会追加到最终 URI 的查询字符串之后。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to pass in text within the name/value pairs that prevent the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在名称/值对中传入文本，以阻止生成的 URI 与用于生成它的模板匹配。

trans-unit.source: Examples of such text includes: '/', '..', '*', '{', and '}'.
The base address.
The parameter values.
Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
A new instance.
The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> parameter contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> 参数包含参数名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: The parameters are matched up against the variables within the template by a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 将参数与模板中的变量匹配时使用区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: Values passed in this collection are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 传入此集合中的值都会经过转义。

trans-unit.source: The name/value collection passed to <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> must contain a key for every template variable.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> 的名称/值集合必须包含每个模板变量的键值。

trans-unit.source: Extra name/value pairs that do not match template variables are appended to the query string of the final URI.
trans-unit.target: 与模板变量不匹配的额外名称/值对会追加到最终 URI 的查询字符串之后。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to pass in text within the name/value pairs that prevent the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在名称/值对中传入文本，以阻止生成的 URI 与用于生成它的模板匹配。

trans-unit.source: Examples of such text includes: '/', '..', '*', '{', and '}'.
The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByName%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A URI that contains the base address.
A dictionary that contains a collection of parameter name/value pairs.
<see langword="true" /> is the default values are ignored; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
A URI.
The base address.
A collection of parameter name/value pairs.
<see langword="true" /> if the default values are ignored; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
Creates a new URI from the template and the collection of parameters.
A URI.
A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base address.
The parameter values.
Creates a new URI from the template and an array of parameter values.
A new <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
The parameter values are bound by position left to right.
trans-unit.target: 参数值按位置从左至右绑定。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter value replaces the first variable found in the template, the second parameter value replaces the second variable, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数值会替换在模板中找到的第一个变量，第二个参数值会替换第二个变量，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Variables passed to this method are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 传递给此方法的变量都会经过转义。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters passed in the values parameter must match the number of variables in the template.
trans-unit.target: 传入值参数的参数个数必须与模板中的变量个数相符。

trans-unit.source: If not, a <xref:System.FormatException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不符，则会引发 <xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to pass in text within the parameter values array that prevents the generated URI from matching the template that is used to generate it.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在参数值数组中传入文本，以阻止生成的 URI 与用于生成它的模板匹配。

trans-unit.source: Examples of such text includes: '/', '.','..', '*', '{', and '}'.
The following code demonstrates this.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码对此进行了演示。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByPosition%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.BindByPosition%28System.Uri%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of name/value pairs for any default parameter values.
A generic dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 一个泛型字典。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether trailing slashes "/" in the template should be ignored when matching candidate URIs.
<see langword="true" /> if trailing slashes "/" should be ignored, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果尾部正斜杠"/"应忽略，否则<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> to compare.
Indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> is structurally equivalent to another.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> is structurally equivalent to another; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
Two <xref:System.UriTemplate> instances are equivalent if their literal strings are identical and the variables appear in the same segments.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 <xref:System.UriTemplate> 实例的文本字符串相同，并且变量出现在相同的段中，则这两个实例是等效的。

trans-unit.source: For example "weather/{state}/{city}" is equivalent to "weather/{country}/{village}".
trans-unit.target: 例如，“weather/{state}/{city}”与“weather/{country}/{village}”结构等效。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.UriTemplate.IsEquivalentTo%28System.UriTemplate%29>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.IsEquivalentTo%28System.UriTemplate%29>。

trans-unit.source: The base address.
The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> to match against the template.
Attempts to match a <see cref="T:System.URI" /> to a <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" />.
An instance.
If the match is successful the <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch> is populated with the URI segments, variable values, query string values, and wildcard segments from the candidate URI.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配成功，则会使用 URI 段、变量值、查询字符串值和候选 URI 的通配符段来填充 <xref:System.UriTemplateMatch>。

trans-unit.source: If the match is unsuccessful, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配失败，则返回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.Match%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Uri%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of variable names used within path segments in the template.
A collection of variable names that appear within the template's path segment.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合，包含模板的路径段中显示的变量名。

trans-unit.source: The collection excludes the names of variables that appear in the query portion of the template.
trans-unit.target: 该集合不包括在模板的查询部分显示的变量名。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplate.PathSegmentVariableNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 <xref:System.UriTemplate.PathSegmentVariableNames%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of variable names used within the query string in the template.
A collection of template variable names that appear in the query portion of the template string.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合，包含在模板字符串的查询部分显示的模板变量名。

trans-unit.source: This collection excludes variable names that appear in the path section of the template string.
trans-unit.target: 此集合不包括在模板字符串的路径部分显示的变量名。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access the <xref:System.UriTemplate.QueryValueVariableNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 <xref:System.UriTemplate.QueryValueVariableNames%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> instance.
The representation of the <see cref="T:System.UriTemplate" /> instance.
The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.UriTemplate.ToString> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用 <xref:System.UriTemplate.ToString> 方法。
